content: Add feature flag definition to mcp/Cargo.toml
Add conditional compilation to BrpGetTraceLogPath and BrpSetTracingLevel enum variants in mcp/src/tool/tool_name.rs
Add conditional compilation to imports in mcp/src/tool/tool_name.rs
Add conditional compilation to get_annotations() match arms for debug tools
Add conditional compilation to get_parameters() match arms for debug tools
Add conditional compilation to create_handler() match arms for debug tools
Add conditional compilation to re-exports in mcp/src/log_tools/mod.rs
Create .cargo/config.toml with build configuration to enable mcp-debug feature locally
Run cargo build to validate implementation
Run cargo nextest run to verify tests pass
